## Browse files using MinIO {#sec-minio}

SeaBee is using [MinIO](https://min.io/) on Sigma2 to provide an S3-compatible API for file storage and transfer. A simple web interface for browsing available files is here. See also the [File storage](./storage.qmd) page for further details.
